Convenience method to select the e-value for the CL signature.
close() - Method in class com.ibm.zrl.credsystem.CredentialStore

CLPredicate - Class in com.ibm.zrl.idmx.showproof.predicates
This predicate expresses proofs of knowledge about credentials.

com.ibm.zrl.credsystem - package com.ibm.zrl.credsystem
Package contains fundamential functionality to use the Idemix anonymous credential system.
com.ibm.zrl.credsystem.utils - package com.ibm.zrl.credsystem.utils
Package contains classes that extend several classes from the Idemix anonymous credential system.
com.ibm.zrl.idmx.dm - package com.ibm.zrl.idmx.dm
This package contains the data model abstractions appearing in the various protocol roles such as credentials, attributes, or commitments.
com.ibm.zrl.idmx.dm.structure - package com.ibm.zrl.idmx.dm.structure
This package contains the structural information about some of the data model abstractions.
com.ibm.zrl.idmx.issuance - package com.ibm.zrl.idmx.issuance
This package contains classes for issuing new credentials.
com.ibm.zrl.idmx.issuance.update - package com.ibm.zrl.idmx.issuance.update
This package contains classes implementing the update functionality, which is an extension to the issuing protocol that can be run non-interactively.
com.ibm.zrl.idmx.key - package com.ibm.zrl.idmx.key
This package contains the code to implement the Idemix key support.
com.ibm.zrl.idmx.showproof - package com.ibm.zrl.idmx.showproof
This package contains the code to implement the Idemix proving protocol.
com.ibm.zrl.idmx.showproof.ip - package com.ibm.zrl.idmx.showproof.ip
This package contains the code to implement the inequality proofs.
com.ibm.zrl.idmx.showproof.pe - package com.ibm.zrl.idmx.showproof.pe
This package contains the code to implement Idemix proving protocol for prime encoded attributes.
com.ibm.zrl.idmx.showproof.predicates - package com.ibm.zrl.idmx.showproof.predicates
This package contains all the predicates that may appear in proof specifications.
com.ibm.zrl.idmx.showproof.sval - package com.ibm.zrl.idmx.showproof.sval
Each sub-proof outputs s-values, which are described by the classes in this package.
com.ibm.zrl.idmx.utils - package com.ibm.zrl.idmx.utils
This package contains various utilities, such as the parser and the serializer, used throughout the Idemix library.
com.ibm.zrl.idmx.utils.perf - package com.ibm.zrl.idmx.utils.perf
This package contains various performance enhancements used in the Idemix crypto lib.
com.ibm.zrl.idmx.ve - package com.ibm.zrl.idmx.ve
Package containing all code to verifiably encrypt a message and to decrypt the ciphertext.
